General.Name: Ulaslar Turizm Yatirimlari ve Dayanikli Tuketim Mallari Ticaret Pazarlama AS
General.Description: Ulaslar Turizm Yatirimlari ve Dayanikli Tüketim Mallari Ticaret Pazarlama A.S. engages in the tourism management and sale of durable consumer goods in Turkey. The company operates hotels under the Club Hotel Ulaslar and Viva Ulaslar Hotel names. Ulaslar Turizm Yatirimlari ve Dayanikli Tüketim Mallari Ticaret Pazarlama A.S. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.
